title: your opinion
content:
hi guys I want your opinion about heavy

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014220318im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Copy%20of%20%D8%AC%D8%A7%D9%87%D8%B2%D8%A9_6468.jpg)
author: feraslove

comments.content:
I suppose this is the sequel to [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014220318/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41936).  
IMO, this is too pictorial, i.e. too little typographic. You pictured a tank. Of course, a tank _is_ heavy – however the overall image doesn’t communicate the abstract idea of ‘heavy’ but rather ‘tank’.

hii florian hardwig

plz can you show me some examples
and what do you think instead of tank I will put just one letter (H) but big
and what do you think instead of tank I will put just one letter (H) but big
